text: function gutenberg_download() downloads one works Project Gutenberg based ID. example, earlier saw one version Persuasion ID 105 (see URL ), gutenberg_download(105) downloads text. Notice returned tbl_df (type data frame) including two variables: gutenberg_id (useful multiple books returned), character vector text, one row per line. can also provide gutenberg_download() vector IDs download multiple books. example, download Renascence, Poems (book 109) along Persuasion, : Notice meta_fields argument allows us add one additional fields gutenberg_metadata downloaded text, title author.
